## raise() function

Raises an event. This places the event in the internal event queue, so that the event is immediately consumed by the machine in the current step.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function raise<TContext extends MachineContext, TExpressionEvent extends EventObject, TEvent extends EventObject = TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction extends ParameterizedObject | undefined = ParameterizedObject | undefined, TDelay extends string = string>(eventOrExpr: NoInfer<TEvent> | SendExpr<TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, NoInfer<TEvent>, TEvent>, options?: RaiseActionOptions<TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, NoInfer<TEvent>, NoInfer<TDelay>>): RaiseAction<TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, TEvent, TDelay>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventOrExpr | [NoInfer](./xstate.noinfer.md)<></>&lt;TEvent&gt; \| [SendExpr](./xstate.sendexpr.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, [NoInfer](./xstate.noinfer.md)<></>&lt;TEvent&gt;, TEvent&gt; |  |
|  options | [RaiseActionOptions](./xstate.raiseactionoptions.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, [NoInfer](./xstate.noinfer.md)<></>&lt;TEvent&gt;, [NoInfer](./xstate.noinfer.md)<></>&lt;TDelay&gt;&gt; | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[RaiseAction](./xstate.raiseaction.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, TEvent, TDelay&gt;
